channel.title: Present on Build green software applications on Azure
channel.description: Recent content in Present on Build green software applications on Azure

item.title: Prepare presentation
item.description: In this step, groups prepare for the final presentation using the following presentation checklist. Checklist Your final presentation must include the following slides. 1. The customer case study Customer case study key points. Main characteristics of the current customer environment. Solutions to customer needs. Responses to customer objections. 2. Architect a solution Proposed solution diagram that meets or exceeds all the customer requirements from the case study and customer needs sections.

item.title: Closeout
item.description: The groups take turns presenting and the others role-play as the customer in the meantime by asking questions, providing feedback. Take notes about your teamâ€™s strengths and areas of improvement.
